DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , open-label , phase Ib/ II study ( two part ) patient locally advance metastatic HER2+ breast cancer . The first part ( phase Ib ) investigate MTD/ RP2D combination therapy BEZ235 BID weekly trastuzumab use Bayesian model . Once MTD/ RP2D establish second part ( phase II ) start . Phase II evaluate efficacy safety weekly trastuzumab plus BEZ235 BID compare capecitabine lapatinib .
